about_the_game:
Harbor Captain is a relaxing maritime game where you navigate ships into the harbor. Click and drag to move ships into the correct docks. Unload the cargo, then leave. Avoid crashing into other ships.

Dock and undock interesting ships in interesting locations

Carefully bring in an LNG carrier along the canals of Port City, while making sure the other ships are waiting for their turn to cross this tight canal. For those who love to multitask, this is Port of Paradise for you. We currently have 3 beautiful maps and are working on more.

Doodle your routes

Channel your inner creativity. Doodle around and watch your ships moving in the most cringe ways. Hey, maybe that doodle will actually result in a higher score.

Manage close calls with clever multitasking

Expertly manage your ship routes to avoid close calls. Just another regular day at the harbor (or as the Brits call it, harbour). Reduce risk of collision by planning your routes way in advance, keeping view of all ships coming in and out of the harbor.

Cross bridges

Navigate your ship under beautiful bridges, while marvelling at the beauty of the vast civilization and economy that was built around the ports.

Harbor Captain is a relaxing maritime game where you navigate ships into the harbor. Click and drag to move ships into the correct docks. Unload the cargo, then leave. Avoid crashing into other ships.

name: Harbor Captain Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Relaxing maritime game where you navigate ships into the harbor. Move ships into the correct colored docks. Avoid shipping accidents in your quest for the high score.
supported_languages: English, German, Dutch, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
